2014 Authorized Sales Representative Co-Op Advertising Program
The Co-Op Advertising Program is a shared-cost advertising program available to Authorized Sales Representatives of Badger Meter solutions. This program is designed to be simple to use, generate more sales for your company and reduce the cost of promoting your business. Approved media includes direct mail, trade show exhibit space, print and digital advertising, trade show banners, and promotional items, such as shirts, pens and coffee mugs. The program runs through December 31, 2014. You will be designated a co-op dollar amount from Badger Meter based on your sales tier and will be reimbursed up to that amount for qualified expenses. To learn how to participate in the co-op program and see examples of approved promotional material, visit the Badger Meter extranet.
Did you know you can sell Industrial Oval Gear Meters?
That's right! Industrial Oval Gear (IOG) is an open distribution product line from Badger Meter. This means you don't have to be specifically contracted or authorized to sell IOG flow meters.
IOG flow meters use oval gear technology to achieve reliable flow measurements for a variety of fluids. Due to its rugged design, IOG meters are especially successful in applications with highly viscous or corrosive liquids.
Plus, IOG meters can be used in conjunction with a variety of industrial registers, such as the new ER-500. The durable ER-500 display option, which provides a flexible, easy-to-use platform for advanced flow process management.

PC200 Replacing PC100 Process Controller ​There are currently limited quantities of PC100 process controllers left in stock. Once the PC100 stock is depleted, the PC200 will be substituted for all orders going forward. To assist users in this transition, we have created a wiring cross reference guide showing connection equivalents between PC100 and PC200 controllers. You can download the reference guide online.
Based on the core functionality of PC100 controllers, the PC200 has evolved to offer additional capability through an easy-to-use interface. The PC200 is a microprocessor-driven instrument designed for batching and filling both small and large quantities, as well as displaying total, accumulated total and flow rate.
